name: The Legend Of Tyranitar Tube Demo (Mac OS X Version)
name_original: The Legend Of Tyranitar Tube Demo (Mac OS X Version)
description:
Begin a brand new adventure as Tyranitar Tube and explore the first ever Pokémon region in our world called the Maepada Region! Discover brand new Pokémon never seen before and a different way of battle to use your Pokémon’s full strength, by battling alongside them! Meet familiar faces and old Pokémon to team up with to find out a way to prevent both our world and the Pokémon world to collapse into each other.

P.S

Windows version and Web browser version will be out eventually
